channel.title: Other people can't connect to my server.. Explain why plz
channel.description:
Ok so i've downloaded a source called 'BrokenX v2' I've done a couple changed w/ the shop etc. and I wanted my friend to come try it out, this also happened with the source 'TeamTorva', but i assumed i have to change the ip's in gui.java and client.java in the client folder
Here's the pics of the gui.java ip's i've edited
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/16/gui1h.png/][IMG]http://img16.imageshack.us/img16/2744/gui1h.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/683/gui2m.png/][IMG]http://img683.imageshack.us/img683/815/gui2m.png[/img][/URL]
And here's the pics of the client.java
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/9/client1o.png/][IMG]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/1422/client1o.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/847/client2.png/][IMG]http://img847.imageshack.us/img847/5990/client2.png[/img][/URL]
In the first picture on client.java i have it changed to 127.0.0.1 because if it's basedworld.no-ip.org i can't connect to my own server. After saving all these i then compiled.
I also changed the information in the source to, the cmd prompt even works too:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/228/cmdpn.png/][IMG]http://img228.imageshack.us/img228/6571/cmdpn.png[/img][/URL]
All my ports are connected, i'm like 95% positive i port forwarded correctly but is this all right?? did i miss something plz tell me, i need to know. I can upload more pics of different things if requested. I have my no-ip running fine too: [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/845/noip.png/][IMG]http://img845.imageshack.us/img845/6271/noip.png[/img][/URL]
IF ANYONE KNOWS WHY NO ONE CAN CONNECT TO MY SERVER PLEASEE TELL ME!! I really need to know!! It'd be greatly appreciated!!

item.title: Other people can't connect to my server.. Explain why plz

Thanks for the attempt… Can anyone help???

item.title: Other people can't connect to my server.. Explain why plz
item.dc:creator: @arrogantlyfly arrogantlyfly
item.description:
@arrogantlyfly wrote:

basedworld.no-ip.org, and i had my friend go through the files to make sure it checked he did ‘server =’, ‘gui.java’ and ‘client.java’ to look for any errors.

Read full topic
item.source: Other people can't connect to my server.. Explain why plz

item.title: Other people can't connect to my server.. Explain why plz
item.dc:creator: @AnonymousZ AnonymousZ
item.description:
@AnonymousZ wrote:

This might sound really stupid…

The download link for your Client, are you uploading it with the IP as 127.0.0.1 OR basedworld.no-ip.biz?

If you’re uploading it with the IP as 127.0.0.1, as you know, they will be connecting to themselves.

Sounds stupid, but you never know;).

Read full topic
